title: Nivolumab
summary: Nivolumab, sold under the brand name Opdivo, is a medication used to treat a number of types of cancer.[6] This includes melanoma, lung cancer, malignant pleural mesothelioma, renal cell carcinoma, Hodgkin lymphoma, head and neck cancer, urothelial carcinoma, colon cancer, esophageal squamous cell carcinoma, liver cancer, gastric cancer, and esophageal or gastroesophageal junction (GEJ) cancer.[4][5][6][7][8] It is used by slow injection into a vein.[4][5][6]
